• Sign Up As A Creator

Empowering Creators To Earn From Home

We believe in the power of real people making real content. With Tiny Cult, anyone in the UK can become a creator. We work with exciting UK brands who want content for their social media. All you need is a smartphone to sign up and start getting paid.


Sign Up
Receive Products

Once you're accepted, you'll be sent products from our clients. It could be anything from health products to beauty, gifts, food & drink or gadgets.

Create Photos & Videos

You'll receive a set of guidelines explaining what photos or videos need creating. Typically it involves demonstrating how a product works or showing the unboxing experience.

Submit & Get Paid

Once you're done simply send your content back to us. We'll check it and then you'll be paid promptly. Plus, you get to keep all the products for free!

The time is now

Company values

There’s nothing I wanted to do in life that I wasn’t able to get good at. I’m not really specifically talented at anything except for the ability to learn.
